login.aboutpxm: PXM facilitates you to enrich the quality of your Product Content, store and manage associated Digital Assets with ease, search for Products effectively, maintain copies of your skus pertaining to different retailers, and publish products faster to eCommerce platforms.
features: Aids in easy and fast syndication to various eCommerce platforms following Product content standards and Retailer-defined rules. Supports various types of integrations with eCommerce platforms.
Smooth and Easy to Use UI simplifies Product data creation and management
Flexible data templates and provision for bulk import of product data helps users to handle complex Product information.
Inbuilt Digital Asset Management (DAM) feature to maintain and manage digital assets and make image editing easier.
